title: Toolbox for hubverse Continuous Integration
text: goal hubCI provide functionality setting hubverse Continuous Integration workflows.

title: Toolbox for hubverse Continuous Integration
text: can install development version hubCI like :

title: Toolbox for hubverse Continuous Integration
text: hubs hosted GitHub, use use_hub_github_action() download one hubverse GitHub Actions. Note: hub configured R project (.e. contain *.Rproj file)

title: Hubverse GitHub Action setup — use_hub_github_action
text: Sets common continuous integration (CI) workflows hub hosted GitHub using GitHub Actions. Available actions hosted repository Infectious-Disease-Modeling-Hubs/hubverse-actions function creates necessary directories downloads requested GitHub Action yaml file.

title: Hubverse GitHub Action setup — use_hub_github_action
text: name Name workflow, .e. name one action repository directories containing GitHub Action workflow .yaml file. ref Desired Git reference, usually name tag ("v0.1.0") branch ("main"). possibilities include commit SHA ("d1c516d") "HEAD" (meaning "tip remote's default branch"). specified, defaults latest published release Infectious-Disease-Modeling-Hubs/hubverse-actions (https://github.com/Infectious-Disease-Modeling-Hubs/hubverse-actions/releases)

title: hubCI 0.0.0.9001
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added ref parameter use_hub_github_action allow downloading specific git references hubverse action files. Now defaults latest release.
